revised_title: Effect of Chemical Combination on X-ray Spectra of Copper: A Study of Intermetallic Compounds
tldr: This study investigates the effect of chemical combination on the X-ray spectra of copper in various intermetallic compounds, solid solutions, and copper oxides. The research focuses on the K α a2 doublet in the emission spectrum and the absorption band edges in several inorganic compounds. The findings provide insights into the nature of intermetallic compounds and their chemical bonds.
